column5: Marketing is being deeply impacted by rapid technological advancement and the proliferation of data. This rapidly changing environment requires future marketing employees to have strong theoretical knowledge and understanding of the field, cultivate critical thinking and hold new skills to deal with the complexity of the modern marketing environment.
column7: UK students MSc Full-time students: £12,700 Part-time per taught credit: £85 Part-time per dissertation credit: £42 EU/International students MSc Full-time students: £16,800 Part-time per taught credit: £112 Part-time per dissertation credit: £56
